entry.title: Premium Taza Natural Rosemary Lavender Shampoo Bar (90 g)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Priya Spa Inc. (CAN)
Type: Shampoos
Price: 19.59 - 24.49 (4 variants)

  • SAFE & ECO-FRIENDLY & VEGAN: Paraben Free, Sulphate Free, PH Balanced; Completely biodegradable and use very little packaging; Zero Waste Bar. Shampoo bars are economic too as each bar keeps on working, lasting so much longer than a bottle of liquid shampoo. Each bar is equivalent to 4-5 bottles of shampoo. Perfect for everyday use and ideal in the washbag for visits to the gym, at the swimming pool or to take on holiday
  • NOURISHING AND MOISTURIZING: Contains Coconut Oil, which helps nourish from hair root to tip to bring out your hair's natural strength, elasticity, and shine
  • HYDRATING: Contains Hydrolyzed Oat Protein, which helps add and retain moisture to your scalp and adds softness, manageability, and texture to your hair; and will impart a soft, cushiony feeling on you scalp with a velvet like smoothness after drying. This protein also provides better hair conditioning with improved bonding and has been used for strength, for shine, for hydration and to reduce breakage. It also helps to temporarily repair damaged areas on your hair
  • CONDITIONING: Contains BTMS 50 which is a vegetable based conditioning emulsifier. It offers excellent detangling and conditions without the build-up often seen with other conditioning agents
  • ADDED EXTRAS: Contains DL-Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5) which improves damaged hair by improving effects of hair elasticity, moisture retention, and flexibility

  • NOURISHING AND MOISTURIZING: Contains optimum blend of Jojoba Oil, Cocoa Butter, Argan Oil, Coconut Oil: Jojoba Oil increases hair shine and strengthens hair; Cocoa Butter penetrates your hair shaft helping to prevent water loss and dryness; Argan Oil moisturizes and is extraordinarily high in antioxidant producing cosmetic benefits; Coconut Oil moisturizes scalp which helps nourish your hair root to tip to bring out your hair's natural strength, elasticity, and shine

entry.title: Taza Natural Moroccan Argan Oil Coconut Conditioner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Priya Spa Inc. (CAN)
Type: Conditioners
Price: 18.39 - 22.99 (4 variants)

*Free Standard Shipping; *Orders from this site Fulfillment by Amazon.ca; *Secure & Protected Cardholder Data Processing with Shopify Payments

Taza Natural Moroccan Argan Oil Coconut Conditioner effectively: stimulates your hair’s growth, strengthens and adds volume to your hair, and provides complete nutrients to maintain your scalp and hair in excellent condition; keeps your hair manageable and detangled for a smooth silky feel; inhibits premature graying; attracts and retains moisture in your hair, protects your hair from the elements, and treats damaged hair; builds body, reduces porosity, and strengthens your hair; soothes and conditions your scalp and controls/ eliminates dandruff. The following are additional features of this conditioner:

  • 99% Natural • No Parabens • No Phthalates • No Sulphates • Ammonium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate (SLS), and Sodium Laureth Sulfate (SLES) Free • Silicone Free •Suitable for all hair types
  • Contains Moroccan Argan Oil (often called liquid gold), which penetrates the hair shaft to improve elasticity, detangles frizzy hair and repairs spit ends 
  • Contains Broccoli Seed Oil which is rich in hair nourishing vitamins such as Vitamin C and B6, which can keep your hair strong and silky smooth as well as smooth out dry and frizzy hair. 
  • Contains Panthenol (ProVitamin B5) which helps retain moisture and protect the hair from the elements.
  • Contains Ivy and Rosemary Extract, which helps to nourish, sooth and protect the scalp.

Key ingredients: Moroccan Argan Oil, Broccoli Seed Oil, Panthenol (ProVitamin B5), Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Ivy Extract, & Rosemary Extract

Prefer to shop for this product on Amazon.ca? No problem, we sell this product there too. Click Taza Natural Moroccan Argan Oil Coconut Conditioner to be redirected to this product's detail page on Amazon.ca.

Get your Taza Natural Moroccan Argan Oil Coconut Conditioner!

Taza Natural Moroccan Argan Oil Conditioner also comes in Peppermint & Tea Tree and Rosemary Lavender.

entry.title: Taza Natural Omega-3 Hemp & Aloe Rosemary Lavender Conditioner
entry.summary:
Vendor: Priya Spa Inc.
Type: Conditioners
Price: 18.39 - 22.99 (4 variants)

*Free Standard Shipping; *Orders from this site Fulfillment by Amazon.ca; *Secure & Protected Cardholder Data Processing with Shopify Payments

Taza Natural Omega-3 Hemp & Aloe Rosemary Lavender Conditioner effectively: stimulates your hair’s growth, strengthens and adds volume to your hair, and provides complete nutrients to maintain your scalp and hair in excellent condition; keeps your hair manageable and detangled for a smooth silky feel; inhibits premature graying; attracts and retains moisture in your hair, protects your hair from the elements, and treats damaged hair; builds body, reduces porosity, and strengthens your hair; soothes and conditions your scalp and controls/ eliminates dandruff. The following are additional features of this conditioner: 

  • 99% Natural • No Parabens • No Phthalates • No Sulphates • Ammonium Lauryl Sulfate, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate (SLS), and Sodium Laureth Sulfate (SLES) Free • Silicone Free •Suitable for all hair types
  • Contains Hemp Seed Oil, which has polyunsaturated fatty acids (omega 3, omega 6, and omega 9) and Vitamin E, to provide complete nutrients to maintain your scalp and hair in excellent condition and to stimulate your hair’s growth
  • Contains Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein and Vegetable Glycerin which attracts and retains moisture in your hair; the Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein also builds body, reduces porosity, and strengthens and improves manageability, luster, and smoothness of your hair
  • Contains Aloe Leaf Juice which also stimulates hair growth, tames unmanageable hair, controls dandruff, and inhibits premature graying; it also contains important nutrients for your hair like: amino acids, proteins, minerals, and vitamins A, C, and E which makes it especially excellent at treating damaged hair
  • Contains Chamomile Flower Extract which helps eliminate dandruff and soothes your scalp; this product also contains Coconut Oil which conditions your scalp and reduces protein loss in your hair shaft

Key ingredients: Hemp Seed Oil, Vegetable Glycerin, Coconut Oil, Aloe Leaf Juice, Chamomile Flower Extract, Panthenol (Pro Vitamin B5), Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Rosemary Lavender Essential Oil.

The Taza Omega-3 Hemp & Aloe Conditioner also comes in Peppermint & Tea Tree.
